settings.review-card-1-text: I absolutely love the protein powder and collagen powder. I make the RH smoothies with both powders which keep me going all morning and even past lunch and I don't overeat at lunch. Plus my hair stylist remarked that my normally thin hair is so much thicker - and it is! I've lost 15 pounds and have kept it off.
settings.review-card-2-text:
I have tried many collagens and none of them really worked for me. I was skeptical when my friends told me about Women’s Collagen but they were right - it 
really changed my appearance in just 2 weeks.
settings.review-card-3-text: At 57 I was getting sick all the time and my energy level was always low. But since I started using Women’s D3 Vitamin my immune system has improved a lot which makes me feel a little bit safer, especially during a pandemic.

settings.title: Promoting confidence with simple supplements
settings.text: Our mission is to remove the confusion about supplements created by many marketing companies selling products you don't need. There are only a few, important supplements to fill nutritional gaps for mature women to support weight loss journey, improve wellbeing and feel youthful.

settings.title: Evidence-backed products. Fast delivery.
settings.text-1: Receive your order in 1- 4 business days

settings.faq-answer-1: Wellinda is a health and wellness brand specializing in tailored supplements for women experiencing menopause. These supplements are carefully crafted to address the unique nutritional needs of women during this life stage, fostering overall well-being.
settings.faq-question-2: Why do I need to use supplements?
settings.faq-answer-2: A dietary supplement adds essential nutrients that might be hard to obtain from regular diet alone. For instance, in winter, when sunlight exposure is limited, vitamin D supplementation becomes necessary. Similarly, while collagen is available in small quantities from food, taking specific doses via supplements can notably benefit skin and joint health. Wellinda’s approach is simple, fix your diet first then consider supplements.
settings.faq-answer-3: There are no side effects to the supplements we recommend. Most, if not all of the products we sell are made up of natural ingredients that can be obtained from the diet.
settings.faq-question-4: What kind of quality controls do you have?
settings.faq-answer-4: We rigorously assess the quality and manufacturing processes used to develop our products before selling them on our site. All products and ingredients have FDA approval and all are manufactured in facilities with ISO or HACCP Certification.
settings.faq-answer-5: Wellinda supplements have been specifically selected and formulated to support the health, wellbeing and performance of middle aged women.
settings.faq-question-6: How do I know which products are best for me?
settings.faq-answer-6: Our products have been selected and developed by nutrition experts, with over 10 years of experience in applied nutrition. They assess each individual ingredient to ensure it is provided in the most bioavailable form, in the most efficacious dosage, with natural ingredients and flavorings, supported by the latest scientific research.
